name: Peace in Pieces
description:
Peace in Pieces is a puzzle platformer set in a liminal abstract city above the clouds.

Challenge yourself with solving different platformer puzzles and collecting the letters as you navigate through the level. Happy letter hunting!

Controls:

  • WASD to walk
  • Space to jump
  • Left click to pick up and place objects
  • M to return to Main Menu

Roles:

  • Programming by Paul, Ilia and Alena
  • 3D modeling by Vili
  • Level design by Alena and Ilari
  • UI design by Ilari
  • Sound design by Gunwoo
  • Testing by Vili

Peace in Pieces was developed in 48 hours for the ConBITi Games Jam.
